text:
The place is fantastic. Exactly what we were looking for. Located on a beautifully quiet residential street yet  it's walking distance from some of the best of what Austin has to offer. 

Billy was beyond accommodating.
From the guest house being stocked with beer, coffee, and TopoChico to his complete understanding / help with our early check-in / late check-out needs.

Billy and his place are the reason why Airbnb > hotels.
title: Bouldin Avenue Studio
